item.title: ConnectWise Automate Install Script
item.description: One would think working in IT would make me a patient person. Today I found myself tired of waiting for the ConnectWise Automate agents to be deployed for a customer. Normally I push these agent-type installs using group policy which is fine in most cases. While there are probably better deployment methods outside of what ConnectWise recommends I figured I’d put together a down and dirty script to speed things up for this particular install.

item.description: Hello World More to come sone, stay tuned!
